data.name: DarkTimes: Wrath of the Raven
data.detailed_description:
Community


About the Game



DarkTimes is a twin-stick shooter with a twist: You can control Anne and Friend, her mystical crow simultaneously. Shoot multiple enemies at the same time!




Use Friend as a grappling hook to move fast and surprise your foes in a skilled based platforming gameplay


Anne has been monster huntress for the past decade. She found love, got pregnant and decided to quit. But her newborn and partner are missing.
Gear up one last time, and go on a quest to get them back, no matter the cost.

Find your way across a distorted version of 1880's Louisiana's infested woods, swamps and lost villages. Fight against monsters and dark magic inspired by Louisiana's legends and lore
data.about_the_game:
DarkTimes is a twin-stick shooter with a twist: You can control Anne and Friend, her mystical crow simultaneously. Shoot multiple enemies at the same time!




Use Friend as a grappling hook to move fast and surprise your foes in a skilled based platforming gameplay


Anne has been monster huntress for the past decade. She found love, got pregnant and decided to quit. But her newborn and partner are missing.
Gear up one last time, and go on a quest to get them back, no matter the cost.

Find your way across a distorted version of 1880's Louisiana's infested woods, swamps and lost villages. Fight against monsters and dark magic inspired by Louisiana's legends and lore
data.short_description: DarkTimes is a twin-stick horror shooter where you can use two guns to aim two directions simultaneously. Defend Louisiana with your occult raven: shoot, dash, stun, bullet time to defeat hordes of monsters. They stole your child, get him back. Want to play with a friend? Coop is in the works!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“DarkTimes is very different as it is a much slower experience, taking in that horror atmosphere that I found interesting. Instead of having 20 to 30 enemies coming at Annie, it was more like 10 at the max trying to use everything at my disposal because I needed to reload after every seven shots. It made me play more tactically than I was used to with this type of game.”
Syndicate Y

“The idea to shoot from different angles using different guns is really unique, and the ability to do that while you are in mid-action is really challenging and interesting to see working inside the game.”
G.Round

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 / Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:

  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 / Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
